hero.description: A modern, privacy-focused, and open-source baby tracker that helps you monitor your little one's growth and daily activities. Self-host for complete data control.

featuresSection.description: Baby Tracker is designed with all the essential features to make parenting a little easier. From feeding schedules to growth milestones, we've got you covered.

feedingTracking.title: Feeding Tracking
feedingTracking.description: Log breastfeeding, bottle-feeding, and solid food intake with ease. Track duration, amount, and type to ensure your baby is getting the right nutrition.

diaperTracking.title: Diaper Changes
diaperTracking.description: Keep a record of wet and dirty diapers. Monitor patterns to ensure your baby is healthy and hydrated.

sleepTracking.title: Sleep Patterns
sleepTracking.description: Track sleep sessions to understand your baby's sleep habits. Log naps and nighttime sleep to establish a healthy routine.

growthMonitoring.title: Growth Monitoring
growthMonitoring.description: Record weight, height, and head circumference. Visualize your baby's growth with interactive charts and compare with WHO percentiles.

historicalData.title: Historical Data
historicalData.description: Access a complete history of all tracked activities. Filter and export data to share with pediatricians or for your personal records.

privacyAndSecurity.title: Privacy & Security
privacyAndSecurity.description: With self-hosting, your data stays on your server. No third-party access, no data mining. Just you and your baby's data.

openSourceSection.description: Baby Tracker is open-source, giving you the freedom to own, manage, and secure your data. No subscriptions, no hidden fees—just a tool built for you.

completeControl.title: Complete Control
completeControl.description: Host the app on your own server or any cloud provider. You have full control over your data and the application.

noMonthlyFees.title: No Monthly Fees
noMonthlyFees.description: Say goodbye to recurring subscriptions. Download, install, and use Baby Tracker for free, forever.

communityDriven.title: Community-Driven
communityDriven.description: Contribute to the project, suggest new features, and be part of a community dedicated to improving the tool for everyone.

customizable.title: Customizable & Extensible
customizable.description: Tailor the app to your needs. The open-source nature allows you to modify and extend the functionality as you see fit.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Take control of your baby's data and start tracking their milestones today. It's free, secure, and all yours.
cta.footer: Join hundreds of parents who trust Baby Tracker

footer.description: A modern, privacy-focused, and open-source baby tracker.

in_progress.stop_timer_description: Do you want to record the sleeping time?
